summary.span: 表示一种字符串比较操作，该操作使用特定的大小写以及基于区域性的比较规则或序号比较规则。

span.span: Represents a string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的对象体现了基于字符串的比较、相等性和哈希代码操作，这些操作将考虑这两种情况和特定于区域性的比较规则。An object derived from the class embodies string-based comparison, equality, and hash code operations that take into account both case and culture-specific comparison rules. 您可以使用 类创建类型特定的比较，以便对泛型集合中的元素进行排序。You can use the class to create a type-specific comparison to sort the elements in a generic collection. 类（如 、、和 ）使用 类进行排序。Classes such as , , , and use the class for sorting purposes. 由 类表示的比较运算定义为区分大小写或不区分大小写，并且使用 word （区分区域性）或序号（不区分区域性）比较规则。A comparison operation that is represented by the class is defined to be either case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and use either word (culture-sensitive) or ordinal (culture-insensitive) comparison rules. 有关 word 和序号比较规则的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about word and ordinal comparison rules, see . > [!NOTE] > 可以下载[排序权重表](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=10921)，这是一组文本文件，其中包含有关 Windows 操作系统排序和比较操作中所使用的字符权重的信息，也可以下载[默认 Unicode 排序元素表](https://www.unicode.org/Public/UCA/latest/allkeys.txt)，这是适用于 Linux 和 macOS 的最新版排序权重表。You can download the [Sorting Weight Tables](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=10921), a set of text files that contain information on the character weights used in sorting and comparison operations for Windows operating systems, and the [Default Unicode Collation Element Table](https://www.unicode.org/Public/UCA/latest/allkeys.txt), the latest version of the sort weight table for Linux and macOS. Linux 和 macOS 上的特定排序权重表版本取决于系统上安装的 [International Components for Unicode](http://site.icu-project.org/) 库的版本。The specific version of the sort weight table on Linux and macOS depends on the version of the [International Components for Unicode](http://site.icu-project.org/) libraries installed on the system. 有关 ICU 版本及它们所实现的 Unicode 版本的信息，请参阅[下载 ICU](http://site.icu-project.org/download)。For information on ICU versions and the Unicode versions that they implement, see [Downloading ICU](http://site.icu-project.org/download). ## 实现的属性Implemented properties 由于看似矛盾，你可能会对如何使用 类属性感到困惑。You might be confused about how to use the class properties because of a seeming contradiction. 类声明为 `abstract` （`MustInherit` Visual Basic），这意味着只能对从 类派生的类的对象调用其成员。The class is declared `abstract` (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), which means its members can be invoked only on an object of a class derived from the class. 矛盾在于 类的每个属性都 `static` 声明（`Shared` Visual Basic），这意味着无需先创建派生类就可以调用此属性。The contradiction is that each property of the class is declared `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), which means the property can be invoked without first creating a derived class. 可以直接调用 属性，因为每个属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。You can call a property directly because each property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class that is derived from the class. 因此，每个属性值的类型为 ，这是匿名类的基类，而不是匿名类本身的类型。Consequently, the type of each property value is , which is the base class of the anonymous class, not the type of the anonymous class itself. 每个 类属性返回支持预定义大小写和比较规则的 对象。Each class property returns a object that supports predefined case and comparison rules. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 类的属性和 方法。The following example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示了不同 对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

Public Shared ReadOnly Property CurrentCulture As StringComparer

member this.CurrentCulture : StringComparer

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象使用当前区域性的单词比较规则执行区分大小写的字符串比较。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当字符串与语言相关时，可以使用 属性返回的 。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant. 例如，如果向用户显示字符串，或者字符串是用户交互的结果，则应使用区分区域性的字符串比较来对字符串数据进行排序。For example, if strings are displayed to the user, or if strings are the result of user interaction, culture-sensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. 当前区域性为与当前线程关联的 对象。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread. 属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 对 属性 `get` 访问器的每个调用都将返回一个新的 对象，如下面的代码所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#1)] 若要提高性能，可以将 对象存储在局部变量中，而不是多次检索 属性的值。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 类的属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示了不同 对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象使用当前区域性的单词比较规则执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。

span.span: Gets a object that performs case-insensitive string comparisons using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

value.span: 用于字符串比较的新对象。

span.span: A new object for string comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前区域性为与当前线程关联的 对象;它由 属性返回。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread; it is returned by the property. 当字符串与语言相关但其大小写不相关时，可以使用 属性返回的 。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant but their case is not. 例如，如果向用户显示字符串，但大小写不重要，则应使用区分区域性的、不区分大小写的字符串比较来对字符串数据进行排序。For example, if strings are displayed to the user but case is unimportant, culture-sensitive, case-insensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. [!INCLUDE[platform-note](~/includes/c-and-posix-cultures.md)] 属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 对 属性 `get` 访问器的每个调用都将返回一个新的 对象，如下面的代码所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#2)] 若要提高性能，可以将 对象存储在局部变量中，而不是多次检索 属性的值。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times.

span.span: if and refer to the same object, or and are both the same type of object and those objects are equal, or both and are ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于运行时无需取消装箱 `x` 或 `y` 如果它们是值类型，或者如果它们是引用类型，则尝试向向下转换 `x` 或 `y` 字符串， 方法可能比 方法略有不同。Because the runtime does not have to unbox `x` or `y` if they are value types or attempt to downcast `x` or `y` to strings if they are reference types, the method may be slightly more efficient than the method.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将获取指定对象的哈希代码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the hash code for the specified object.

returns.span: 根据 参数的值计算出的 32 位有符号哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed hash code calculated from the value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法比 方法更高效，因为 `obj` 参数无需取消装箱即可执行此操作。The method is more efficient than the method because the `obj` parameter does not have to be unboxed to perform the operation. 方法分配与 `obj` 大小成比例的内存量，以计算 `obj`的哈希代码。The method allocates an amount of memory that is proportional to the size of `obj` to calculate the hash code of `obj`. 对于大字符串，尝试检索哈希代码可能会引发 。In the case of large strings, trying to retrieve the hash code can throw an . 相反，可以使用替代算法，在计算哈希代码时分配固定的内存量。Instead, you can use an alternate algorithm that allocates a fixed amount of memory when calculating hash codes. 若要使用此算法，请将[< NetFx45_CultureAwareComparerGetHashCode_LongStrings >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md)元素添加到应用程序配置文件的[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)部分。To use this algorithm, add the [](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md) element to the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of your application's configuration file.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存可用于分配计算哈希代码所需的缓冲区。

span.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法比 方法更高效，因为 `obj` 参数无需取消装箱即可执行此操作。The method is more efficient than the method because the `obj` parameter does not have to be unboxed to perform the operation. 方法分配与 `obj` 大小成比例的内存量，以计算 `obj`的哈希代码。The method allocates an amount of memory that is proportional to the size of `obj` to calculate the hash code of `obj`. 对于大字符串，尝试检索哈希代码可能会引发 。In the case of large strings, trying to retrieve the hash code can throw an . 相反，可以使用替代算法，在计算哈希代码时分配固定的内存量。Instead, you can use an alternate algorithm that allocates a fixed amount of memory when calculating hash codes. 若要使用此算法，请将[< NetFx45_CultureAwareComparerGetHashCode_LongStrings >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md)元素添加到应用程序配置文件的[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)部分。To use this algorithm, add the [](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md) element to the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of your application's configuration file.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存可用于分配计算哈希代码所需的缓冲区。

span.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static StringComparer InvariantCulture { get; }
.property class System.StringComparer InvariantCulture
Public Shared ReadOnly Property InvariantCulture As StringComparer
public: static property StringComparer ^ InvariantCulture { StringComparer ^ get(); };
member this.InvariantCulture : StringComparer

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象使用固定区域性的单词比较规则执行区分大小写的字符串比较。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 将以语言相关的方式比较字符串，但它不适合在任何特定区域性中显示。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 它的主要应用程序是以一种在不同的区域中相同的方式对字符串排序。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 固定区域性是 属性返回的 对象。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 类的属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示了不同 对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

related.span: 有关使用 .NET 中字符串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象使用固定区域性的单词比较规则执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 将忽略大小写的以语言相关的方式比较字符串，但它不适合在任何特定区域性中显示。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner that ignores case, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 它的主要应用程序是以一种在不同的区域中相同的方式对字符串排序。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 固定区域性是 属性返回的 对象。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class.

related.span: 有关使用 .NET 中字符串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象执行区分大小写的序号字符串比较。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive ordinal string comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 执行独立于语言的简单字节比较。The returned by the property performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比较以编程方式生成的字符串或比较区分大小写的资源（例如密码）时，这是最合适的。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-sensitive resources such as passwords. 属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 类的属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示了不同 对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

related.span: 有关使用 .NET 中字符串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象执行不区分大小写的序号字符串比较。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive ordinal string comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 会将字符串中的字符视为使用固定区域性的约定转换为大写的字符串，然后执行独立于语言的简单字节比较。The returned by the property treats the characters in the strings to compare as if they were converted to uppercase using the conventions of the invariant culture, and then performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比较以编程方式生成的字符串或比较不区分大小写的资源（如路径和文件名）时，这是最合适的。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-insensitive resources such as paths and filenames. 属性实际上返回派生自 类的匿名类的实例。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 类的属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示了不同 对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

related.span: 有关使用 .NET 中字符串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET
